title: Riven Vs Yasuo Event
body: Is it possible to buy only the way of order pass and farm it out to get the border without the riven skin? Then is it possible to farm out the chaos side daily without the pass to get the Chaos border and then buy the skins later?

replies.body: Wondering this as well, tbh. It's like 4k RP if you don't own Riven for her, her skin, and the pass. Which is asinine. I hope the border ticket lasts forever but can only be acquired during this period.
Yes, though you cant activate the crafted item until you own the skins, and those may or maynot expire on the 24/7
